Text: Thanks for the upload, but I don't think that it's a good idea to package things like this into RAR files. People often want to choose particular files to download rather than getting the whole thing, and with a torrent this big that's an important option. Thanks anyway.
I think the bigger problem is this, Hannibal- Who the hell is gawn sit down and read 1824 books? Dx I think 100 is alright, good actually, but any more than that is just hard drive suicide.
